Method Detail

aggregate

java.util.List aggregate(java.util.List pipeline, com.mongodb.AggregationOptions options = AggregationOptions.builder()
Execute a MongoDB aggregation pipeline. Note that the pipeline should return documents that represent this domain class as each return document will be converted to a domain instance in the result set
Parameters:
pipeline - The pipeline
options - The options (optional)
Returns:
A mongodb result list
